about_the_game:
About This Game

A Tribute to the Classics, Return to the City of Rain!

Rain Echoes is a fan-made music adventure game inspired by the iconic Symphonic Rain. Players will return to the city of rain after 20 years, exploring forgotten corners, rediscovering key details from the original story, and experiencing newly added narrative content.

Game Features:

  • A World Divided by Day and Night:
    The game alternates between day and night, each with its own unique atmosphere. At night, players will follow the guidance of a music box, collecting scattered musical clues throughout the city, and restoring lost melodies. During the day, players will perform the restored music to awaken the memories of those who have long forgotten the past and hear their touching stories.

  • A Heartfelt Story:
    Each musical performance triggers unique memory fragments that reveal the touching tales hidden within the city. Music serves as a bridge, connecting the hearts of people and piecing together lost memories.

  • A Fusion of Music and Adventure:
    This game is not only an emotional journey but also a blend of music and adventure. Players will explore and solve puzzles to restore melodies and bring the city back to life with music.

  • Beautiful Visuals and Soundtrack:
    Paying homage to the original, the game introduces a fresh visual style and original soundtrack, breathing new life into the City of Rain.

Why You Should Play:

  • If Symphonic Rain touched your heart, Rain Echoes will offer a familiar yet refreshing experience.

  • With new story elements and added details, both new players and long-time fans can immerse themselves in the unique charm of the City of Rain.
